context: I missed an important family gathering
letters:
Dear Dad,

I hope this note finds you well. I’ve been thinking a lot about the recent family gathering, and I cannot express how truly sorry I am for missing it. It was an important occasion for our family, and I regret not being there to share those moments with all of you.

There’s no excuse for my absence, and I understand how disappointing it must have been for you and everyone else. Family means the world to me, and it breaks my heart to know that I let you down. I always cherish the time we spend together, and not being there feels like a missed opportunity to create lasting memories with you and the rest of the family.

Please know that I value our time together immensely, and I promise to make it up to you. I’d love to schedule a time to meet soon, just the two of us, or even have our own family gathering if that sounds good to everyone. 

Thank you for your understanding and patience with me. I love you more than words can express and I’m truly sorry for any hurt my absence might have caused.

With all my love,

[Your Name]
